title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Engineering Education Philosophy and Inquiry-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in engineering education or science subject instruction
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can clearly classify and explain their engineering education philosophy according to four knowledge/instruction types (two teacher-centered, two learner-centered)
Learners can apply the five stages of inquiry-based learning design (problem definition → hypothesis formulation → experiment design → data analysis → conclusion drawing) to actual science classes
Learners can validate their lesson designs and suggest improvements through peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
